title: Super Mario RPG
summary: Super Mario RPG: Legend of the Seven Stars[lower-alpha 1] is a role-playing video game developed by Square and published by Nintendo for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System in 1996.[lower-alpha 2] It was the final Mario game published for the SNES. The game was directed by Chihiro Fujioka and Yoshihiko Maekawa, produced by Mario creator Shigeru Miyamoto, and scored by Yoko Shimomura.
